ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Assign Numbers to a Call Queue
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Assign Numbers to a Call Queue
ActivityMetadata.Description: After [buying phone number(s)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020808292#h_007ec8c2-0914-4265-8351-96ab23efa3ad), you can assign it, allowing callers to directly dial a number to reach a [call queue](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360021524831-Managing-Call-Queues). **Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher account plan. * Account owner or admin permissions * Zoom Phone license **Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Assign Numbers to a Call Queue

After [buying phone number(s)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020808292#h_007ec8c2-0914-4265-8351-96ab23efa3ad), you can assign it, allowing callers to directly dial a number to reach a [call queue](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360021524831-Managing-Call-Queues). **Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher account plan. * Account owner or admin permissions * Zoom Phone license **Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`

Method: Post

OperationID: assignPhoneToCallQueue

EndPoint:

/phone/call_queues/{callQueueId}/phone_numbers

Usage: phone_numbers[]

[{ "id": "%id%", "number": "%number%" }]
